Name: Fabricator - Lone Light in the Long Night
AttributesDescription:
Enemeis take 15% more total DMG. Echo Skill deals 25% more total DMG.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: The thorns of the wildflowers had encased the glass, and creeping vines traced the curve of her hand. The girl watched for a long time, and finally reached toward the flame beneath the greenery.
ObtainedShowDescription: Enemeis take 15% more total DMG. Echo Skill deals 25% more total DMG.
